response.overview: Narrated by her granddaughter, Marisa Schiaparelli Berenson, the documentary explores the life of fashion designer Elsa Schiaparelli, revealing never-before-seen images from the family's private collection. Inspired by the book of the same name, written by Marisa Schiaparelli Berenson and published by Double-Barrelled Books (UK).
response.title: Elsa Schiaparelli's Private Album
